2016-07-02_13-15_Sat.gpx.title: Balcome - Staplefield - Ouse Valley Viaduct - Ardingly Reservoir
2016-07-02_13-15_Sat.gpx.desc: A hard-on-the-feet and hilly walk, with the purpose of gawping at the viaduct.  Gorgeous Sussex countryside in places, fabulous varied views and a VIADUCT!

2016-06-11_13-14_Sat.gpx.title: Lindfield (South) - Horsted Keynes
2016-06-11_13-14_Sat.gpx.desc: A very wet walk.  Slightly below par in the views department, but lots of lovely woods and fields and mud.

2016-05-28_12-13_Sat.gpx.title: Kingscote - Sheffield Park
2016-05-28_12-13_Sat.gpx.desc: A ride behind the C class, followed by a walk from Kingscote to Sheffield Park.  Follows the Bluebell Railway.
